column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4567_f469f79ff8f33c8d487d48cd6af83e1c73cf0a94/ for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-te

Good catch.

BTW: we should add `CNode* FindNode(std::string addrName)` to net.h. It has the other two overloads but not this one, so I spent some time trying to find how passing a std::string would even compile :)
